body_html:
I'd be fine with tf.contrib.data for this.

Is there any hope of making liblmdb work with TF's file readers? One concern I have is that, unlike the other I/O datasets, this one only works with local files, and not HDFS/GCS/S3/etc.
body_text:
I'd be fine with tf.contrib.data for this.
Is there any hope of making liblmdb work with TF's file readers? One concern I have is that, unlike the other I/O datasets, this one only works with local files, and not HDFS/GCS/S3/etc.
body:
I'd be fine with `tf.contrib.data` for this.

Is there any hope of making liblmdb work with TF's file readers? One concern I have is that, unlike the other I/O datasets, this one only works with local files, and not HDFS/GCS/S3/etc.
